No.Is this game as bad as the user scores? Hell no.Going into part 2 being pretty well exposed to all the leaks except for the cutscenes\, I wanted to be able to form my own opinion.This game is definitely a tough pill to swallow\, but I am glad I stuck with it for its entirety as this is without a doubt one of the most confronting & relentless video games I have ever experienced. Perhaps a little too heavy with the social commentary at times as well as some moments that will have questioning if it was included only to shock (not to mention I personally thought it could have had a little bit more optimistic moments like part 1 instead  of being all “doom and gloom” for the majority)\, it is a technical achievement to behold with a story that will have you go through a whole spectrum of emotions. By the end of it i was satisfied with my 31 hours I spent playing and it’s going to be an experience I won’t be forgetting any time soon.8/10… Expand
